summary: an overpowered spell that makes every thing flee before you
descriptionHtml:
after watching the 50th anniversary of doctor who I wanted to play a doctor who style character by playing peacefully unless it was a dragon and quest essential kill or a dwaven constructs (as the doctor kills darleks and cybermen)
so i created this spell which makes people and creatures
calm
flee
frenzy
and paralyze
it also turns the undead. and all for one hour i am thinking of adding a new vesion but without the paralyze effect also if you enjoy the spell there is a clara follower who uses the spell so go and support the mod
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=204213102&searchtext=
only problem is you have to cheat the spell in as im not sure on how to add as a spell book or as a starting item but this is my first mod
enjoy
author: shotgunrain
